verses.text: \w Let|strong="H2142"\w* \w your|strong="H2142"\w* salvation \w come|strong="H2142"\w* quickly, \w O|strong="H2142"\w* God; \w come|strong="H2142"\w* quickly \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* help, \w O|strong="H2142"\w* Lord.

Let those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* go after \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w have|strong="H3068"\w* shame \w and|strong="H3068"\w* trouble; let those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* evil designs against \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* turned back \w and|strong="H3068"\w* made foolish.

\w Let|strong="H5315"\w* \w those|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* say Aha, aha! \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w turned|strong="H5472"\w* \w back|strong="H0268"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H1245"\w* reward \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* \w shame|strong="H0954"\w*.

Let all \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H0559"\w* are looking \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* glad \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*; let \w the|strong="H0559"\w* lovers \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* salvation \w ever|strong="H7725"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w May|strong="H7725"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* great.

\w But|strong="H0559"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w am|strong="H0430"\w* poor \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* need; come \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H8055"\w* quickly, \w O|strong="H8055"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w help|strong="H3444"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* saviour; \w let|strong="H8055"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* waiting, \w O|strong="H8055"\w* Lord.
